verbs.description: [V: suspect] stops at bar while fleeing scene of motorcycle accident akron ohio a hit and run accident takes a bizarre turn when the suspect makes a pit stop at a bar as he fleeing the scene it happened wednesday around 5 30 p m on archwood ave in akron the accident involved a van and motorcycle akron police lt lt rick edwards akron ohio motorcycle rick edwards akron ohio akron police
